languages.text: "Севиция была обычной прислужницей. Она билась с тварями Имматериума, а когда варп начал одолевать нас, она попыталась меня спасти, увести прочь, но я не послушал ее... Она осталась со мной до последнего мига и погибла ужасной смертью... Проклятая гордыня".

traits.locale_text: "Таддеуш был корабельным священником. Я принебрег почти всеми ритуалами защиты от Губительных сил, полагаясь полностью на свои способности и одного-единственного священнослужителя. Когда ритуал закончился и я лицезрел происходящее на яву... Мысль о том, что все мои любимые ученики в муках скончались, а он продолжит жить, вывела меня из себя. Севиция... бедная служка, единственная из них, кто не испугался происходящего вокруг безумия. Она в героическом порыве старалась пробудить меня от скитаний в нематериальном измерении. В момент, когда я был так близок к завершению... Мне ничего не оставалось, кроме как в мгновение сжечь ее разум".

languages.text: "Sevitia was an ordinary servant. She fought the Immaterium's monsters until the warp began to prevail. She tried to save me, to lead me away, but I did not listen. She stayed at my side until the last moment and died a terrible death... all because of my accursed pride."
languages.original_text: "Севиция была обычной прислужницей. Она билась с тварями Имматериума, а когда варп начал одолевать нас, она попыталась меня спасти, увести прочь, но я не послушал ее... Она осталась со мной до последнего мига и погибла ужасной смертью... Проклятая гордыня".

traits.locale_text: "Sevitia was an ordinary underling. She fought the Immaterium's monsters until the warp was starting to prevail and she tried to save me, to lead me away, but I did not listen... because of my accursed pride. I only brushed her off, but she did not survive being hit with even that small a fraction of my might."

"Sevitia was an ordinary underling. She fought the Immaterium's monsters until the warp was starting to prevail and she tried to save me, to lead me away, but I did not listen... because of my accursed pride. I only brushed her off, but she did not survive being hit with even that small a fraction of my might."

"Sevitia was an ordinary servant. She fought the Immaterium's monsters until the warp began to prevail. She tried to save me, to lead me away, but I did not listen... because of my accursed pride. I only brushed her off, but she did not survive being hit with even that small a fraction of my might."

"Sevitia was an ordinary servant. She fought the Immaterium's monsters until the warp began to prevail. She tried to save me, to lead me away, but I did not listen... because of my accursed pride. I only brushed her off, but she did not survive being hit with even that small a fraction of my might."

"Sevitia was an ordinary servant. She fought the Immaterium's monsters until the warp began to prevail. She tried to save me, to lead me away, but I did not listen. She stayed at my side until the last moment and died a terrible death... all because of my accursed pride."

"Sevitia was an ordinary servant. She fought the Immaterium's monsters until the warp began to prevail. She tried to save me, to lead me away, but I did not listen. She stayed at my side until the last moment and died a terrible death... all because of my accursed pride."

languages.text: «Sevitia era una sirvienta normal. Se enfrentó a los monstruos del Inmaterio hasta que la disformidad empezó a triunfar. Intentó salvarme, alejarme, pero no la escuché. Permaneció a mi lado hasta el final y murió de forma horrible... por culpa de mi condenado orgullo».
languages.original_text: "Sevitia was an ordinary servant. She fought the Immaterium's monsters until the warp began to prevail. She tried to save me, to lead me away, but I did not listen. She stayed at my side until the last moment and died a terrible death... all because of my accursed pride."

traits.locale_text: «Sevitia era una sirvienta normal. Se enfrentó a los monstruos del Inmaterio hasta que la disformidad empezó a triunfar. Intentó salvarme, alejarme, pero no la escuché. Permaneció a mi lado hasta el final y murió de forma horrible... por culpa de mi condenado orgullo».

languages.text: 「セビティアは平凡な従者だった。彼女は<歪み>が広がり始めるまで、非物質世界の怪物と戦ったんだ。私を救おうとして、その場から連れ出そうとしてくれたのだが、私は耳を貸さなかった…最後の瞬間まで、彼女は私の傍にいてくれた。そして、彼女は命を落とすことになってしまった。全ては私のプライドのせいだよ」
languages.original_text: "Sevitia was an ordinary servant. She fought the Immaterium's monsters until the warp began to prevail. She tried to save me, to lead me away, but I did not listen. She stayed at my side until the last moment and died a terrible death... all because of my accursed pride."

traits.locale_text: 「セビティアは平凡な従者だった。彼女は<歪み>が広がり始めるまで、非物質世界の怪物と戦ったんだ。私を救おうとして、その場から連れ出そうとしてくれたのだが、私は耳を貸さなかった…最後の瞬間まで、彼女は私の傍にいてくれた。そして、彼女は命を落とすことになってしまった。全ては私のプライドのせいだよ」

languages.text: “塞维蒂娅是位普通的仆人，她一直在和亚空间的怪物勇敢战斗，但亚空间的力量却渐渐占了上风。她想把我救出来，带我走，但我却不肯听她的。她一直陪在我身边，直到最后一刻。她死得很惨……都怪我那该死的傲慢。”
languages.original_text: "Sevitia was an ordinary servant. She fought the Immaterium's monsters until the warp began to prevail. She tried to save me, to lead me away, but I did not listen. She stayed at my side until the last moment and died a terrible death... all because of my accursed pride."

traits.locale_text: “塞维蒂娅是位普通的仆人，她一直在和亚空间的怪物勇敢战斗，但亚空间的力量却渐渐占了上风。她想把我救出来，带我走，但我却不肯听她的。她一直陪在我身边，直到最后一刻。她死得很惨……都怪我那该死的傲慢。”

languages.text: "Sevitia war eine gewöhnliche Dienerin. Sie hat die Monster des Immateriums bekämpft, bis der Warp zu siegen begann. Sie hat versucht, mich zu retten, mich fortzuführen, aber ich hörte nicht zu. Sie blieb bis zuletzt an meiner Seite und starb einen entsetzlichen Tod ... alles nur wegen meines verfluchten Stolzes."
languages.original_text: "Sevitia was an ordinary servant. She fought the Immaterium's monsters until the warp began to prevail. She tried to save me, to lead me away, but I did not listen. She stayed at my side until the last moment and died a terrible death... all because of my accursed pride."

traits.locale_text: "Sevitia war eine gewöhnliche Dienerin. Sie hat die Monster des Immateriums bekämpft, bis der Warp zu siegen begann. Sie hat versucht, mich zu retten, mich fortzuführen, aber ich hörte nicht zu. Sie blieb bis zuletzt an meiner Seite und starb einen entsetzlichen Tod ... alles nur wegen meines verfluchten Stolzes."

languages.text: « Servitia était une servante ordinaire. Elle a combattu les monstres de l'Immaterium jusqu'à ce que le Warp commence à prendre le dessus. Elle a tenté de me sauver, de me détourner de la voie que j'avais empruntée, mais je n'ai rien voulu entendre... Elle est restée à mes côtés jusqu'au bout avant de mourir dans d'atroces tourments... et tout cela par la faute de mon orgueil démesuré. »
languages.original_text: "Sevitia was an ordinary servant. She fought the Immaterium's monsters until the warp began to prevail. She tried to save me, to lead me away, but I did not listen. She stayed at my side until the last moment and died a terrible death... all because of my accursed pride."

traits.locale_text: « Servitia était une servante ordinaire. Elle a combattu les monstres de l'Immaterium jusqu'à ce que le Warp commence à prendre le dessus. Elle a tenté de me sauver, de me détourner de la voie que j'avais empruntée, mais je n'ai rien voulu entendre... Elle est restée à mes côtés jusqu'au bout avant de mourir dans d'atroces tourments... et tout cela par la faute de mon orgueil démesuré. »

languages.text: "Sevitia, sıradan bir hizmetkârdı. Öteboyut galip gelmeye başlayana dek Tindiyar canavarlarıyla savaştı. Beni kurtarmaya, uzaklaştırmaya çalıştıysa da onu dinlemedim. Son ana kadar yanımdan ayrılmadı ve korkunç bir biçimde can verdi... Hepsi benim lanet kibrim yüzünden."
languages.original_text: "Sevitia was an ordinary servant. She fought the Immaterium's monsters until the warp began to prevail. She tried to save me, to lead me away, but I did not listen. She stayed at my side until the last moment and died a terrible death... all because of my accursed pride."
